items.name: creature
items.description: A creature holds information about a creature in game, such as its health, name, etc.

invocations.description: Returns your creatures's name.
Returns the creature's id. It is unique for each creature.
Returns the creature's current health percentage.
Returns the creature's current x position.
Returns the creature's current y position.
Returns the creature's current z position.
Returns the direction which the creature is currently looking to. Direction can be 'n', 'e', 's' or 'w'.
Returns the character's speed.
Returns true if the creature is currently moving from on SQM to another, false otherwise.

items.name: item
items.description: A container holds information about an item. Items can be found in your inventory, containers and tiles.

invocations.description: Returns the item's id.
Returns the item's count.
Returns the item's special value. It's used for items such as liquid pools and liquid containers, to tell what kind of liquid it has inside.

items.name: container
items.description: A container holds information about a container. That way you can check if a container is open or not, what items it has inside, etc.

invocations.description: Returns the container's name.
Returns the container's item id.
Returns the amount of items inside the container.
Returns the container's capacity.
Returns the structure for the item at index itemindex. The index ranges from 1 to .itemcount.
Returns true if the container is currently open, false otherwise.
Returns true if the container has paginations enabled, false otherwise.
Returns true if the container has a higher window, false otherwise.

items.name: tile
items.description: A tile holds information about a tile on your screen. So you can read each item on a tile.

invocations.description: Returns the amount of items on the tile.
Returns the item at index itemindex. The index ranges from 1 to .itemcount.

items.name: message
items.description: A message holds information about messages you receive.

invocations.description: Returns the content of the message received.
Returns the name of the player who sent the message.
Returns the level of the player who sent the message.
Returns the type of the message received.

items.name: projectile
items.description: A projectile holds information about projectiles on the screen. Like when you shoot a missile rune in a creature.

invocations.description: Returns the type of the projectile.
Returns the position x from there the projectile was shot.
Returns the position y from there the projectile was shot.
Returns the position x to where the projectile was shot.
Returns the position y to where the projectile was shot.
Returns the time in milliseconds when the projectile was shot.

items.name: effect
items.description: An effect holds information about effects that shows up on your screen. Like the 'poof' when you miss a hit on a creature.

invocations.description: Returns the type of the effect.
Returns the position x where the effect happened.
Returns the position y where the effect happened.
Returns the time in milliseconds when the effect was shot.

items.name: animatedtext
items.description: An animatedtext holds information about animated texts that shows up on your screen. Like when you get hit by a creature.

invocations.description: Returns the type of the animated text.
Returns the content of the animated text.
Returns the position x where the animated text happened.
Returns the position y where the animated text happened.
Returns the time in milliseconds when the animated text was shot.

items.name: rectangle
items.description: A rectangle is used to hold information about $screenwin, $clientwin and $worldwin.

invocations.description: Returns the coordinates of the left edge of the rectangle.
Returns the coordinates of the top edge of the rectangle.
Returns the coordinates of the right edge of the rectangle.
Returns the coordinates of the bottom edge of the rectangle.
Returns the width of the rectangle.
Returns the height of the rectangle.
Returns the coordinates of the horizontal center of the rectangle.
Returns the coordinates of the vertical center of the rectangle.

items.name: point
items.description: Returns a point in the screen. Used for $cursor.

invocations.description: Returns the x coordinates of the point.
Returns the y coordinates of the point.

items.name: itemdata
items.description: Holds information about an item from the game.

items.name: supplyitem
items.description: Holds information about a supply from your currently selected supply list.

items.name: lootingitem
items.description: Holds information about a looting item from your currently selected loot list.

items.name: vipnode
items.description: Holds information about a player from your VIP list.

items.name: mouseinfo
items.description: Holds information about the item in-game that your mouse is currently pointing to.

items.name: deathtimer
items.description: Holds information about a player who died on your screen.

items.name: playerinfo
items.description: Holds war information about a player from your relation lists.
